name: Aberlyn
description: A quiet fishing village nestled on the western coast. Known for its fresh seafood and annual boat festival.

name: Cardale
description: A bustling market town at the crossroads of major trade routes. Famous for its textile industry and colorful weekly market.

name: Dunreach
description: An ancient fortress town built into the mountainside. Home to the prestigious Dunreach Academy of Magic and Alchemy.

name: Fynmere
description: A vibrant town surrounded by lush forests. Known for its medicinal herbs and the annual Harvest Moon Festival.
